headline: Aron England Joins Accruent as Chief Product and Technology Officer
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, October 20, 2025--Accruent, a leading provider of solutions to unify the built environment, today announced Aron England as Chief Product and Technology Officer (CPTO). This strategic move reinforces Accruent’s focus on accelerating innovation and delivering intelligent, connected solutions that empower organizations to better manage and optimize their built environments.
